content:
{"name": "Lyndhurst Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Make appointment at the location to receive food 
- No spanish speaking personnel so please have a translator or the translator app with you.
- Serves Lyndhurst residents only. Must show proof of residency indicating the address with zip codes 07031, 07032, 07071, and 07094.
- Must show proof of income
- Must drop by the office to confirm if approved to receive food.", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "253 Stuyvesant Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Lyndhurst", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07071", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.8147963, "longitude": -74.1261523}, "phones": [{"number": "(201) 804-2421", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Zip code restrictions"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
